articles.author: Katya Naidu
articles.title: Share of women at senior positions in India has seen a drop, reveals WEF report - Business Insider India
articles.description: India ranks at 127 when it comes to overall gender parity, below Kuwait, Myanmar, Japan and African nations like Gambia. It has improved its overall gender
articles.content: In India, there is an uptick in wage parity when it comes to men and women compared to last year. However, the share of women in senior and technical roles has fallen in the same time period, accordi… [+2817 chars]
